page.title: 09GOVERNMENT
page.content: {LOCAL, NATIONAL, EUROPEAN. { {LOCAL :}THERE ARE TWO DIFFERENT LAYERS OF LOCAL GOVERNMENT:DISTRICT COUNCIL(RESPONSIBLE FOR HOUSING,LITTER COLLECTION ETC) AND REGIONAL COUNCIL(RESPONSIBLE FOR EDUCATION, SOCIAL WORK ETC).INCREASINGLY LOCAL GOVERNMENT IS BEING CONTROLLED BY NATIONAL GOVERNMENT POLICIES. {NATIONAL :}THERE ARE THREE MAIN PARTIES IN THE NATIONAL GOVERNMENT (CONSERVATIVE, LABOUR AND ALLIANCE). THE LOCAL MP IS CURRENTLY LABOUR BUT THE CONSERVATIVE PARTY IS IN POWER NATIONALLY. {EUROPEAN :}BRITAIN IS A MEMBER OF THE COMMON MARKET AND THEREFORE AFFECTED BY THE DECISIONS OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT.
